mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select * from qa order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select.if: select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select * from qa order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select * from qa where category=#{category} order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

mapper.select: select count(*) from qa where category=#{category}

select.if: select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select * from qa where ${key} like '${search}' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between ${startNum} and ${endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select * from qa where ${key} like '${search}' and logtime between SYSDATE-${date} and sysdate order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between ${startNum} and ${endNum}

mapper.update: update qa set hit = hit+1 where seq=#{seq}

select.if: select count(*) from qa where ${key} like '${search}' order by 1 desc
select count(*) from qa where ${key} like '${search}' and logtime between sysdate-'${date}' and sysdate order by 1 desc

mapper.select: select * from qareply where seq=#{seq} order by logtime desc
select * from qareply where seq=${seq} and id='${id}' and content='${content}'
select content from qareply where replyseq=#{replyseq}
